tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thank you Mam for such a positive vibes .. today I visited Manikonda apollo clinic for chest pain as this was my first visits to cardiologist I was very scared after seeing my ecg she said everything is normal and I was feeling relief .such a positive aura she have definitely recommending every one who are looking for good cardiologists big thumbs upüëçüëçüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* *******  surprised to see negative reviews, she patiently checks all the reports very detailed diagnose of the problem. We went with a confusion of Angioplasty or bypass surgery for my father as few doctors suggested stents and few bypass.
Tripti maam has checked in detail and gave very good advice to go for stents, bypass is ruled out.
She was like a family member, answering all our questions..
No doubt she is a fantastic doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was there to have a follow up for my father after his Angioplasty (not from Apollo) a week's back.***** *** **** ********** ** ******* ****** ** *** ********* ***** ** ** ******* She later prescribed a huge set up of tests and sort of insisted that I get it done from Apollo itself and meet her in couple of hours. She declined to give any medicine until the test results.

Many of those tests were ***** ******* ***** such as EGC, Vitamin D, Vitamin B12, Lipid profile, Sugar, etc. In fact, she prescribed a colour doppler test, which was already conducted before the Angioplasty and the report was attached with the discharge summary. Had those tests be so important, the hospital ****** *** * **** ******* ******* **** ********* which conducted the Angioplasty could have done it already.

Apollo informed the total cost for the tests around INR 20,000. **** * ******* *** ***** *** *** **** *** ** ***** **** * ****** ****** ************ ** **** *** ** ** ****** *** ********* ******** ** ** **** ** ****** *** *** **** ********** ** ******* *** ***** **** ***** ******* ****** **** ******** ** *******

It was such an unfortunate experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
1) For the first 10min, the doctor was on a call with someone and she didn't care whether we are waiting for her or not. We were sitting quietly in front of her for the first 10min until her call is done.
2) She doesn't want to listen to patients' problems, she was not looking at us all while speaking. Most of the time, she was using her mobile. 
3) When we asked some questions, she responded "In logonko, do do bar bolna padtha hai(We always have to tell these people twice)*** *** ******* **** *** ** **** ** *** ******** She is not friendly and is not explaining the health issue. As far as I know, she just wants to finish the appointment ASAP.
5) We felt like we wasted our money for nothing.
6) After a week, we took an appointment with another doctor from the same hospital, *** ** **** **** ****** ** ********* ********** ** ** *** **** *** **** ** ***** *** *** ****** **** * ****** *** ****** *** ******* ********7) For patients, I think the doctor's friendliness itself gives a lot of confidence and positive vibes.

tags: Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Rude with patients
No proper explanation
She doesn't care about what we are saying
Always on phone
Irritated 
No patience

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I took online consultation of the doctor and paid Rs500/- I have shared all my reports that I have got done as a part of regular health check up. I had little high cholesterol. Doctor advised I need to visit her in person at the Apollo Hospital so that she can assess with other tests.
I went to Hospital and she has asked me to get all heart related tests(ECG,2D Echo, TMT & other tests).**** ******* ** ***** ******** *** **** **** *** ******** * **** *** * *** ****** *** ****** ************ *** she didn't prescribe any medicines until all test results came. As I already paid online Rs500/- without any prescription provided, she could have at least charged me less when I visited hospital next day.   Her response was also little rude **** * ***** ** *** *** ********* **** ********* ***** **** ******* *****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ***** *** **** ****** ** * ***** *********** ** ******** ** ***** *** ******** She admitted the patient ******* *** ****** ********* ** ********* to icu and told us that the patient will be kept under observation for 24 hours and thereafter it being a Sunday and a non working day for her *** ******* *** **** ************* **** ** **** *** ******* ** ***** We ended up paying a huge amount when the patient was only having low bp and she herself had stated that patient looks fine *** ** ******** ** ** ***** *********** **** ** ** *** ****** * ***** ****** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went apollo clinic in chanda nagar to consult for my mother chest pain she had last week for two days. 

We waited there almost one and half an hour to consult the doctor. She was very  patient and checked all the reports, ********* ********* *** ******* *** ********* ** ** *** ********** Doctor given her personal number to contact if any further questions. 

The next day went to Apollo Jubilee hills to complete the same and she was very good response and done the procedure perfectly and explained the blockages where my mother had in her heart. 

We are very happy for the response, correct diagnosed, and the results. Thanks to the doctor to all the way she supported in the hospital formalities and procedures. 

Raghu

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited the doctor at Apollo Kondapur for high cholesterol. I had to wait an hour for the doctor. Apollo website has given incorrect timings on their website. The doctor caught the root cause of my high cholesterol within a minute for which i have been struggling for years and had visited many doctors. 
Following her advice, my cholesterol came down to normal within 3 weeks. 
She was very friendly at the clinic although she seemed to be in a hurry. She gave me her number to call in case of any queries and I did call her as i had some questions but she was rude over the call. 
Overall, I am really thankful to her as she caught my problem within a minute and helped me lower my cholesterol. I would definitely recommend her to other patients.

tags: Wait time,
review: She will give more tablets for Sugar, Cardiology patients but it is very defecult to share problem of patients to doctor********** ********* ** *****

context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: I had appointment at 8 pm at Apollo Clinic. I reached around 7.45 pm at Apollo but she was not available in the hospital and told that she will take 45 to 60 mins to reach. If I can wait, she will come to the clinic was her response, which I agreed. After waiting for nearly 1 hour in hospital, the behaviour she expressed was completely not acceptable. Pls don't visit her..She don't know how to talk to patient...
